name: SMS Application
description: A web application to send SMS messages, and read logs, using Twilio Programmable Messaging.

ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio accountSid. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio accountSid. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

TOKEN_PASSWORD.description: Password that you set, to allow use of this application.
